# Pilot Boat Services for Port Colborne, Ontario

Great Lakes Pilotage Authority (GLPA) is soliciting bids from qualified service providers for pilot boat services at Port Colborne, Ontario. The pilot boat service involves transporting pilots to and from vessels in the boarding and disembarking area off Port Colborne. Contract Reference | GLPA-1000027 | | Contract Title | Pilot Boat Services for Port Colborne, Ontario | | Tender Closing Date | July 18th, 2024 @ 3:00 PM EST | Selection Criteria .md Selection criteria will be based on the combined highest rating of technical merit and price. Limited Tendering Reasons None Trade Agreements Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) Regions of Opportunity Ontario (except NCR) Contractsual Delivery Regions Ontario (except NCR) Category | Criteria| | 1 |Accurately and effectively transport pilots to and from vessels in the boarding and disembarking area of Port Colborne, Ontario.| | 2 |Operate vessels in a safe and environmentally responsible manner| | 3 | Requests for further information and participating in briefing sessions, if requested.| *.fonostructures requires the provider to transport up to 50 pilots to and from vessels in the boarding and disembarking zone off Port Colborne during bid coverage period| *.Transportation Safety Requirements will be based on GLPA participating standards (e.g. CSA, OSHA)- Contact Information PHP
